title: What will Van Halen's guitarist Eddie Van Halen be remembered for after his recent death? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was not aware he passed away today, until now, I had to on the Duck Duck Go search engine to find out, though I knew he had been diagnosed with cancer some time ago. Eddie will be remembered as a great guitar player who created some awesome sounds on his guitars, I was never really a fan of Van Halen, the band, but I had tremendous admiration for Eddie as a musician.
He literally changed the face of rock guitar playing. He was as important to my generation as Hendrix was to previous generations.
